nodes.bodyText:
I do not understand of the parameter forceExtraction.
Why do we need them?

addWaypointsFromText() is called in two contexts - extracting from listing (needs forceExtraction = true) and extracting from personal note (should respect global setting, therefore forceExtraction = false).
Where is the extra parameter "cache_menu_allowWaypointExtraction" used?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -857,6 +857,8 @@
     <string name="cache_log_images_title">Log images</string>
     <string name="cache_log_image_default_title">Photo</string>
     <string name="cache_personal_note">Personal note</string>
+    <string name="cache_menu_preventWaypointsFromNote">Prevent waypoints from note</string>
+    <string name="cache_menu_allowWaypointExtraction">Allow waypoints from note</string>

nodes.bodyText: Those two lines are for the cache menu - enabling / disabling waypoint extraction from personal note.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -857,6 +857,8 @@
     <string name="cache_log_images_title">Log images</string>
     <string name="cache_log_image_default_title">Photo</string>
     <string name="cache_personal_note">Personal note</string>
+    <string name="cache_menu_preventWaypointsFromNote">Prevent waypoints from note</string>
+    <string name="cache_menu_allowWaypointExtraction">Allow waypoints from note</string>

nodes.bodyText: but it is a checkbutton, isn't it?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -857,6 +857,8 @@
     <string name="cache_log_images_title">Log images</string>
     <string name="cache_log_image_default_title">Photo</string>
     <string name="cache_personal_note">Personal note</string>
+    <string name="cache_menu_preventWaypointsFromNote">Prevent waypoints from note</string>
+    <string name="cache_menu_allowWaypointExtraction">Allow waypoints from note</string>

nodes.bodyText: No, the strings starting with "cache_menu_" refer to the new menu entry at the end of the cache menu, whereas the new string "cache_personal_note_preventWaypointsExtraction" is for the checkbox in the personal note edit dialog.
